metadata.title: CVE-2021-27815 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Deference in the exif command line tool, when printing out XML formatted EXIF data, in exif v0.6.22 and earlier allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) by uploading a malicious JPEG file, causing the application to crash.

criterions.comment: exif package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
